title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the search functionality in the external jar.
2. Perform a search for references to the specified field.
3. Double-click on the first search result.
4. Observe that the first match is not selected.
